hero.title: Fedai
hero.subtitle: Recep Tayyip Erdoğan University UAV Team

overview.projects: We develop innovative solutions with our projects in different fields.
overview.team: We work with our 7-person core team in 4 units, continuing to grow with new talents.
overview.competitions: We achieved success in 5 different competitions, we won 3 awards.
overview.contact: Contact us to get information about our projects and collaborations.

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Who are we and what do we do?
about.description: Fedai is a UAV team consisting of students from Recep Tayyip Erdoğan University. We are a team that has achieved success in TEKNOFEST competitions and continuously improves itself.

who.title: Who Are We?
who.description1: Fedai Team is a student community specializing in UAV technologies, consisting of students from Recep Tayyip Erdoğan University. Our team, established in 2020, develops innovative solutions in autonomous flight systems, image processing, artificial intelligence and machine learning.
who.description2: Our team has achieved success in Turkey's leading UAV competitions and participated in national and international projects. Our team, which aims to train the aviation engineers of the future, works with a focus on continuous learning and development.

teknofest.title: TEKNOFEST Championship
teknofest.description: We aim to become champions in the 2024 TEKNOFEST UAV Competition.

international.title: International Success
international.description: We want to represent Turkey in international UAV competitions.

industry.title: Industry Collaborations
industry.description: We aim to establish collaborations with defense industry and technology companies.

academic.title: Academic Development
academic.description: To support the academic careers of our team members and direct them to master's/doctoral programs.

2020.title: Foundation
2020.description: Fedai Team was established at Recep Tayyip Erdoğan University. We started working in UAV technologies with our first members.

2021.title: First Projects
2021.description: We developed our first UAV projects. We started working on autonomous flight systems and basic image processing algorithms.

2022.title: First Competition Experience
2022.description: We participated in the METU UAV Competition. We gained experience by participating in a national competition for the first time and developed teamwork.

2023.title: Achievements
2023.description: We became finalists in the TEKNOFEST UAV Competition. We won 3rd place in the ITU UAV Competition. We stood out with our camouflage target detection project.

2024.title: Development
2024.description: We have become a strong team with 15+ members. We developed 8 different projects. We are preparing for TEKNOFEST 2024.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To be a team that develops innovative solutions in unmanned and intelligent technologies, especially in air, land, sea and space systems; achieving success in national and international arenas, with high engineering and leadership skills, training the technology pioneers of the future.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To develop innovative projects in air, land, sea and space systems; to strengthen engineering, research and teamwork culture, to contribute to the development of national technology and to train the technology leaders of the future.

values.title: Our Values
values.item1.desc: We bring new ideas to life by continuously learning and researching.
values.item2.desc: We unite our talents from different fields for a common goal.
values.item3.desc: We aim for the highest quality in every project.
values.item4.desc: Contributing to our country's power in the field of technology is our top priority.
values.item5.desc: We design our solutions to add value to future generations.

team.title: Our Team
team.subtitle: Our areas of expertise and responsibilities

competitions.subtitle: Competitions we participated in and our achievements

news.subtitle: Latest news, achievements and events from Fedai Team

partners.title: Fedai Team's Strong Supporters
partners.subtitle: Our valuable supporters who enable us to bring our projects to life and stand by us on our journey to success.
